NAEB HEADQUARTERS
September 17» 1952
TO* All ins rakers of the NAEB Board of Directors
FROMi Jim Miles
Gentleman s
At the committee meeting last week-end, it was requested that I take over
the house here at the University of Illinois in order that it might be avails
able for my successor It was also requested that I request an extension of
ny leave from Purdue until February 1*> 1953© On both points* I can report*
"Mission accomplished®"
I haven*1 paid the rent yat but have looked over the house* and Elisabeth*
Rickey* and I will be residence there shortly after October 1®
I will not report on this meeting® Ibis will come directly from Ausmus©
I merely wanted you to have this bit of information regarding the Executive
Director post©
MEB—FAE grant applications are coming in in volume© Vie will have $0 or
60 to consider and should have a good group to choose froaio The committee
will meet as originally planned on September 29 and 30 and October 1©
Sincerely*
Executive Dir ctor
